items.sentence: I'm not the one who told Tom he should study French.
I didn't think Tom wanted to go to Boston with Mary.

If Tom had been there, he would've joined the fight.
Tom lost three pounds in the first week of his diet.
Tom knows better than to walk home alone after dark.
Tom finally realized that there was something wrong.

I think that Tom would be able to fix your computer.
